title: The Beached Lamb Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quirky cafe in Newquay en route to famous surf beach Fistral. Has a Thai inspired chill-out lounge and cafe with reggae music. Owner is vegan, and the menu includes many veg dishes such as scrambled tofu breakfast with dairy-free spread on toast, avocado and falafel sandwich, houmous and falafel platter, soy latte, vegan shakes made with soy ice cream and fresh fruits.
